alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 13 at 1:42PM MST until February 14 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 5 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph possible. * WHERE...East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains. * WHEN...From Midnight tonight to 5 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles on north to south oriented roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow and reduced visibilities in blowing snow are possible.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains
